MariaDB.description:
MariaDB, relational database management system.

Based on a custom docker image: https://hub.docker.com/r/linuxserver/mariadb, available for amd64 and arm64 architecture.

/config.description: Choose a share where the database should be stored. Eg: create a share called mariadb-server1 for this purpose alone.
/config.label: Data Storage

MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD.description: Enter a root password for the MariaDB server (minimum 4 characters).
MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD.label: Root password.

PGID.description: Enter a valid GID to use along with the above UID. It (or the above UID) must have full permissions to the share mapped in the previous step.
PGID.label: GID to run MariaDB as.

PUID.description: Enter a valid UID to run MariaDB as. It must have full permissions to the share mapped in the previous step.
PUID.label: UID to run MariaDB as.
